testAddition

public static boolean testAddition()
Test addition method that randomly creates two numbers between 1 and 20. Works out the answer. Asks the user if they know the answer and compares the users answer and computers. If the user gets thae answer correct then turn is returned, else false.

Returns:
bollean - True or false of as to whether the user was correct.

optionMenu

public static void optionMenu()
Prints out a menu that says. 1. Try an addition test, 2. Results, 3. New player, 4. Top five players and 5. Quit.

                      int next,
                      java.lang.String newData)

next - int[] - The next position to be written to in the array.

add

public static int add(int[] myArray1,
                      int next,
                      int newData,
                      java.lang.String[] myArray2,
                      java.lang.String name)
Add method to add a bigger number to an array and a string. Checks to see if the array is full or not. If array not full, add item to array. If array full, is number being added bigger than that of the last number in the array. Then detele last int and string of the two arrays and add the new values to them. Else print message. Return Next postion to be written to.

Parameters:
myArray1 - int [] - Array of int to be checked.
next - int - The next position to be written to in the array.
newData - int - The new number to be consider to be added.
myArray2 - String[] - The string array to be updated as well.
name - String - The new string value to be added.
Returns:
int - The next Position to be written to in the array.

bubbleSort

public static void bubbleSort(int[] list,
                              java.lang.String[] list2)
Bubble sort method, order an int array. The bubble sort also sorts a string arry to the same order as the int array.

Parameters:
list - int[] - The array of ints to be sorted.
list2 - String[] - The array of strings to be sorted along side the ints.

remove

public static int remove(int[] myArray,
                         int next,
                         int pos)
Remove method to remove a int value from a array. Checks for Vaild postion, then loops to fill gap. If not a vaild postion then prints postion number inputted with "not valid position". Return next postion to be written to.

Parameters:
myArray - int[] - The array of ints for an item to be deleted.
next - int - The next position to be written to.
pos - int - The position to be deleted.
Returns:
int - The next Position to be written to in the array.

save

public static void save(java.lang.String[] myArray,
                        int[] myArray2)
Saves the string and int values to a file called Score.txt. Has exception built in for error handeling. Loop through, writes all the the string and int numbers.

Parameters:
myArray - String[] - The array to store the names.
myArray2 - int[] - The array to store the scores.

load

public static void load(java.lang.String[] myArray,
                        int[] myArray2)
Loads the saved string and int values from a file called Score.txt. Has exception built in for error handeling. Loop through, reading all the the sting and int numbers.

Parameters:
myArray - String[] - The array to store the names.
myArray2 - int[] - The array to store the scores.
